languages.text: Has an additional single shot (not AoE) that deals double damage and pushes the target 5. Minimum range 2 (can’t use point-blank). Increased effective range.

traits.locale_text: Has an additional single shot (not AoE) that deals double damage and pushes the target 5. Minimum range 2 (can’t use point-blank). Increased effective range.

languages.text: This weapon has an additional single-target attack that deals double damage and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 5 cells away. For this attack, the minimal firing range is 2 cells, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g} is increased by +5.
languages.original_text: У этого оружия есть дополнительная одиночная атака, которая наносит двойной урон и {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} цель на 5 клеток. Для этой атаки минимальная дальность составляет 2 клетки, а {g|Encyclopedia:Range}эффективная дальность{/g} увеличена на 5 клеток.

traits.locale_text: This weapon has an additional single-target attack that deals double damage and pushes the target 5 cells away. For this attack, minimal firing range is 2 cells and the effective range is increased by +5.

This weapon has an additional single-target attack that deals double damage and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 5 cells away. For this attack, the minimal firing range is 2 cells, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g} is increased by +5.

This weapon has an additional single-target attack that deals double damage and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 5 cells away. For this attack, the minimal firing range is 2 cells, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g} is increased by +5.

languages.text: Bu silahın iki katı hasar veren ve hedefi 5 hücre uzağa {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}iten{/g} ilave bir tek hedefli saldırısı bulunur. Bu saldırının minimum atış menzili 2 hücredir ve {g|Encyclopedia:Range}etkili menzili{/g} ise +5 daha fazladır.
languages.original_text: This weapon has an additional single-target attack that deals double damage and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 5 cells away. For this attack, the minimal firing range is 2 cells, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g} is increased by +5.

traits.locale_text: Bu silahın iki katı hasar veren ve hedefi 5 hücre uzağa iten ilave bir tek hedefli saldırısı bulunur. Bu saldırının minimum atış menzili 2 hücredir ve etkili menzili ise +5 daha fazladır.
Bu silahın iki katı hasar veren ve hedefi 5 hücre uzağa iten ilave bir tek hedefli saldırısı bulunur. Bu saldırının minimum atış menzili 2 hücredir ve etkili menzili ise +5 daha fazladır.

languages.text: Esta arma tiene un ataque adicional contra un solo objetivo que inflige daño doble y {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empuja{/g} al objetivo a 5 casillas de distancia. El alcance de disparo mínimo de este ataque es de 2 casillas, y su {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcance efectivo{/g} aumenta en +5.
languages.original_text: This weapon has an additional single-target attack that deals double damage and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 5 cells away. For this attack, the minimal firing range is 2 cells, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g} is increased by +5.

traits.locale_text: Esta arma tiene un ataque adicional contra un solo objetivo que inflige daño doble y empuja al objetivo a 5 casillas de distancia. El alcance de disparo mínimo de este ataque es de 2 casillas, y su alcance efectivo aumenta en +5.

languages.text: 这把武器拥有额外攻击方式，可以攻击单个目标，造成双倍伤害，并将目标{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}5格。这种额外攻击方式的最小射程为2格，{g|Encyclopedia:Range}有效射程{/g}扩大5格。
languages.original_text: This weapon has an additional single-target attack that deals double damage and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 5 cells away. For this attack, the minimal firing range is 2 cells, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g} is increased by +5.

traits.locale_text: 这把武器拥有额外攻击方式，可以攻击单个目标，造成双倍伤害，并将目标推开5格。这种额外攻击方式的最小射程为2格，有效射程扩大5格。

languages.text: Cette arme dispose d'une attaque supplémentaire à cible unique qui inflige le double de dégâts et {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousse{/g} la cible de 5 cases. La portée de tir minimale de cette attaque est de 2 cases et sa {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée efficace{/g} augmente de +5.
languages.original_text: This weapon has an additional single-target attack that deals double damage and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 5 cells away. For this attack, the minimal firing range is 2 cells, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g} is increased by +5.

traits.locale_text: Cette arme dispose d'une attaque supplémentaire à cible unique qui inflige le double de dégâts et repousse la cible de 5 cases. La portée de tir minimale de cette attaque est de 2 cases et sa portée efficace augmente de +5.

languages.text: この武器には2倍のダメージを与える追加の単体攻撃性能があり、ターゲットを5セル分{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}突き飛ばす{/g}。この攻撃では、最低射程は2セル、{g|Encyclopedia:Range}効果範囲{/g}が+5増加する。
languages.original_text: This weapon has an additional single-target attack that deals double damage and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 5 cells away. For this attack, the minimal firing range is 2 cells, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g} is increased by +5.

traits.locale_text: この武器には2倍のダメージを与える追加の単体攻撃性能があり、ターゲットを5セル分突き飛ばす。この攻撃では、最低射程は2セル、効果範囲が+5増加する。
この武器には2倍のダメージを与える追加の単体攻撃性能があり、ターゲットを5セル分突き飛ばす。この攻撃では、最低射程は2セル、効果範囲が+5増加する。

languages.text: Diese Waffe hat einen zusätzlichen Einzelziel-Angriff, der doppelten Schaden verursacht und das Ziel 5 Felder {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}zurückstößt{/g}. Die minimale Feuerentfernung für diesen Angriff sind 2 Felder. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effektive Reichweite{/g} erhöht sich um +5.
languages.original_text: This weapon has an additional single-target attack that deals double damage and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 5 cells away. For this attack, the minimal firing range is 2 cells, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g} is increased by +5.

traits.locale_text: Diese Waffe hat einen zusätzlichen Einzelziel-Angriff, der doppelten Schaden verursacht und das Ziel 5 Felder zurückstößt. Die minimale Feuerentfernung für diesen Angriff sind 2 Felder. Die effektive Reichweite erhöht sich um +5.

languages.text: У этого оружия есть дополнительная одиночная атака, которая наносит двойной урон и {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} цель на 5 клеток. Для этой атаки минимальная дальность составляет 2 клетки, а {g|Encyclopedia:Range}эффективная дальность{/g} увеличена на 5 клеток.

traits.locale_text: У этого оружия есть дополнительная одиночная атака, которая наносит двойной урон и отталкивает цель на 5 клеток. Для этой атаки минимальная дальность составляет 2 клетки, а эффективная дальность увеличена на 5 клеток.
